segments.text: You taught at a local school for a year , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I was there as an English teacher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I was fond of those lovely children
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So why did you decide to resign ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The school is a little bit too far away . I simply want to take good care of my elderly grandfather .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . But why don't you continue to work as a teacher ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's better for me to meet new challenges in life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you can have more room for development .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I can experience another kind of life style .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds like a good idea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope I can adapt to the new job as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
